Package com.oap2024team7.team7mediastreamingapp.controllers.admin

Class AdminUserManagementController

java.lang.Object
com.oap2024team7.team7mediastreamingapp.controllers.admin.AdminUserManagementController
public class AdminUserManagementController extends Object
Controller class for the Admin User Management screen. This class is responsible for handling user interactions with the Admins User Management screen.
Author:
Agata (Agy) Olaussen (@agyCoding)
